tweets.text: @AlanDaviesbirds @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I don’t know if it’s lazy thinking, no thinking or not caring thinking. A mixture, maybe. Wildlife is attacked on all sides. Where would we be without all of its defenders?
@ChrisGPackham @AlexiaRFishwick @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Insane!! It’s May!! Illegal & totally stupid.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Your totally right ✅ there Chris to point this out, Nature & Wildlife Must come first before any construction projects, I will pass this on to my friends to pass it all over the media !
Philip (Pip)

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Thank you for highlighting this (and happy birthday btw). Does our regulatory and enforcement laws need to be more robust as it seems to me that this area is weak where loopholes are exploited.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Many thanks for picking this up Chris. My good mate @WiseBirding has been working hard to publicise this. Happy Birthday by the way.
@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding @EnvAgency @RSPBEngland I am ashamed and incredibly annoyed, why on Earth have you done this, PLEASE STOP IT.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Thank you Chris & Chris for taking a stand on this. A potentially brilliant project marred by ludicrous timing and even more ludicrous proposals for finding and "protecting" nests that are (irony claxon) already protected - by law.

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

More destruction of nature?@EnvAgency Birds are breeding at the Lower Otter Restoration Project! #HS2 They are supposed to be protected! @GreenJennyJones @CarolineLucas @ZacGoldsmith https://t.co/LrFVhWMohv

Please find out the facts.  That is all I ask.  Thank you.

tweets.text: I wonder if we will get a comment before work starts from one of the lead project partners as shown on the LORP website?https://t.co/QmOqIv3ULS @ClintonDevon @EnvAgency @PebblebedHeaths https://t.co/NsYmoFJkdP
Are you listening yet? @ClintonDevon @EnvAgency @NESouthWest https://t.co/x5ZAl4DoPj

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Re-name the Environment Agency to Destruction agency I am sure that developers around here are thinking the same if HS2 can do it then so can we, there is too much of it going on down here as well in nesting season 😡
@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup @ChrisGPackham Well done Chris...whatever happens, you have put yourself on the line. Chapaeu, sir 👏👏

So @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency nothing changes. You really are a DISGRACE. Us being poisoned by LFG & sanctioning the destruction of breeding birds at Lower Otter Restoration Project how dare you use the title Environment.
@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @ChrisGPackham @StinkStopthe

This isn't just a stink, hydrogen sulphide is a lethal gas that can kill instantly at high enough concentrations. If this keeps on happening, night after night, someone is going to die. Someone needs to help Newcastle under Lyme.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding 1/2Thanks Chris.. I live adjacent to the site and I can assure you the dormice excuse is a spin.. the real reason is that there is a time limit on the money being spent.. they shortly lose it hence the panic to get it done..

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency You are out of your depth-you say you don’t know what’s causing it so how can we trust that you’ll fix it? And If you don’t know what’s causing it why would you allow tipping to restart? @DefraGovUK Step in! #stopthestink https://t.co/J1rszFiI6u

@johnvarley @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding What are the facts? The project website says they're beginning scrub clearance and tree felling tomorrow, at the height of the nesting season, because they have a funding deadline. This is insane, illegal, and ecologically illiterate https://t.co/d6eRd4Xssv

tweets.text: @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe Hi Rob, this is a condition specified in the @StaffordshireCC planning permission rather than the @EnvAgencyMids environmental permit. But my understanding is that it allows tipping between 07:00 & 19:00 on weekdays and 07:00 & 13:00 on Saturdays.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding What sort of Government sets up laws & regulations, then ignores them when it suits, @EnvAgency!!?  Step in & stop this fiasco, @NESouthWest.. you're supposed to be "working to establish thriving #nature for people & planet"!!  @DoubleDownNews @Channel4News @pow_rebecca @itvnews
